body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.  
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of personal information.  
Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand.
The conversation should be at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time and end the conversation.
Return the conversation formatted like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Good afternoon! This is Kenneth Harris with Noble Art School. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, Kenneth. This is Donna James. I'm really upset about a privacy issue I've encountered with your school.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm terribly sorry to hear that, Donna. We take privacy concerns very seriously. Can you provide me with more details about what happened?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, it appears that some of my artwork has been shared publicly without my consent. I was assured that all student work would remain confidential.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand your anger, and I apologize for this oversight. To help resolve the issue, may I please have your student ID and the name of your class instructor?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure. My student ID is zero eight two nine, and my instructor's name is Sarah Miller.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Donna. I'll report this immediately and ensure that your artwork is removed from our public platforms. We'll also investigate how this happened in the first place.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Kenneth. I appreciate your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's my duty to assist you. We will also review our privacy policies to prevent such incidents in the future. Is there anything else I can help you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that would be all. Thank you for addressing this so promptly.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Donna. Thank you for bringing this to our attention. I'm sorry for the inconvenience caused. Have a good day!
